channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: PCN vehicle located for months, 15th January
item.description:
Ford vehicle parked for months in a two hour location

At the beginning of Meadoway

item.title: Bad pothole on edge of draincover, 15th January
item.description:
Pothole or damage on side of drain cover. Really bad banging if unfortunate to go over. Had to check my wheel and tyre.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 259, Gloucester Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Spilt paint, 15th January
item.description:
A can of paint was left by the corner of Cheviot / Priors Roads a couple of weeks ago. The pot has now been opened and the paint poured over the grass and pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 258, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence, 15th January
item.description:
Fence down at the back of 130 Lavington Drive Longlevens Gloucester GL2 0HT, I’ve reported this before and no one has been out or been in touch, the fence runs along the bypass from C@G roundabout to Elmbridge court along the houses we don’t own the fence but a fence is down and needs fixing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lavington Drive, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Iron manhole cover is loose and rattling when cars drive over it., 15th January
item.description:
The manhole cover is directly outside number 30 Hazel Way, just prior to the turning for the Hazel way / sycamore walk cul de sac. The manhole cover has been loose for approximately a month.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two potholes, one on each side of the road, within 100m of each other, 15th January
item.description:
Belmont, Hyde Lane is the nearest house. The potholes are about 50cm from the shoulder, posing a danger to bicycles in particular.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not fixed!, 15th January
item.description:
You’ve closed this incident off as fixed when it absolutely isn’t. These bollards have been outside my house since November. Please can this be sorted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Cleevelands Avenue, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in middle of carriageway, 15th January
item.description:
There are emergency roadworks here at the side of the road for a burst pipe. All traffic if effectively single file using only one section of the carriageway. A pothole has opened up in the shared area and its not really avoidable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28-33, Barlow Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 15th January
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please replace x1 broken rocking 750x600x20mm slab with tarmac patch due to tree roots damage number 1 (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 15th January
item.description:
